definitions: A work of art depicting inanimate subject matter, typically commonplace objects which are either natural (food, flowers, dead animals, etc.) or man-made (drinking glasses, books, vases, jewelry, etc.).
The genre of painting or photography concerned with the depiction of inanimate objects.
examples: The artist specialized in still life.
She painted a beautiful still life of fruit and flowers.
The museum has several Dutch still lifes from the 17th century.
